Quick search

GeoWombat configuration¶

GeoWombat has a context manager (geowombat.config) to assist in configurations¶

Import GeoWombat

In [1]: import geowombat as gw

Wrap functions in a context manager to control global arguments

In [2]: with gw.config.update(sensor='qb', scale_factor=0.0001):
   ...:     with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:         for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:             print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor qb
scale_factor 0.0001
nodata None
ref_image None
ref_bounds None
ref_crs None
ref_res None
blockxsize 512
blockysize 512
compress None
driver GTiff
tiled True
bigtiff NO
l57_angles_path None
l8_angles_path None

In [3]: with gw.config.update(sensor='ps', tiled=False):
   ...:     with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:         for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:             print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor ps
scale_factor 1.0
nodata None
ref_image None
ref_bounds None
ref_crs None
ref_res None
blockxsize 512
blockysize 512
compress None
driver GTiff
tiled False
bigtiff NO
l57_angles_path None
l8_angles_path None

In [4]: with gw.open(rgbn) as ds:
   ...:     for k, v in ds.gw.config.items():
   ...:         print(k, v)
   ...: 
sensor None
scale_factor 1.0
nodata None

ref_bounds None
